name: worklink-v2
description: WorkLink recruitment platform - Admin portal and worker PWA

scripts.start: npm run start:build && npm run start:server
scripts.start:build: npm run clean > /dev/null 2>&1 && npm run build:admin > /dev/null 2>&1 && npm run build:worker > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'âœ… Build complete'
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,admin,worker -c blue,green,magenta "cross-env PORT=3000 nodemon --ignore data/ server.js" "cd admin && npm run dev" "cd worker && npm start"
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:admin && npm run build:worker && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ All builds completed successfully!'
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing admin dependencies...' && npm install && echo 'ðŸ”¨ Building admin portal...' && npm run build && echo 'âœ… Admin portal built successfully!'
scripts.build:worker: cd worker && echo 'ðŸ“± Installing worker dependencies...' && npm install && echo 'ðŸ”¨ Building worker PWA...' && npm run build && echo 'âœ… Worker PWA built successfully!'
scripts.clean: echo 'ðŸ§¹ Cleaning build cache and dist folders...' && rm -rf admin/node_modules/.vite worker/node_modules/.vite admin/dist worker/dist admin/node_modules/.cache worker/node_modules/.cache 2>/dev/null && echo 'âœ… Cleaned: Vite cache, dist folders, and node cache'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd admin && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install
scripts.email:send-test: node -e "const emailService = require('./services/email'); emailService.initialize().then(() => emailService.sendTestEmail({to: process.env.ADMIN_EMAIL || 'admin@worklink.sg', subject: 'WorkLink Test Email', text: 'Email system is working!'})).then(r => console.log('Test email sent:', r)).catch(console.error)"
